title: Workstream Bundle
description: Schema for a single workstream bundle used by the pipeline orchestrator.

openspec_change.title: OpenSpec Change ID
openspec_change.description: Identifier linking to an OpenSpec change or requirement.

files_scope.title: Files Scope
files_scope.description: List of file paths this workstream claims ownership over (relative paths).

files_create.title: Files Create
files_create.description: Files this workstream is allowed to create (relative paths).

tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.description: High-level tasks to perform within this workstream.

depends_on.title: Dependencies
depends_on.description: Upstream workstream IDs this workstream depends on.

tool.title: Primary Tool
tool.description: Primary tool identifier used to execute this workstream (e.g., 'aider'). DEPRECATED: Use 'capability' instead for AIM-based routing.

capability.title: Capability
capability.description: Capability to invoke via AIM (e.g., 'code_generation', 'linting'). Takes precedence over 'tool' when AIM is enabled.

capability_payload.title: Capability Payload
capability_payload.description: Additional payload data for AIM capability invocation (e.g., files, prompt, context).

circuit_breaker.title: Circuit Breaker
circuit_breaker.description: Optional circuit breaker configuration for the executor.

parallel_ok.title: Parallel OK
parallel_ok.description: Whether this workstream can run in parallel with others.

conflict_group.title: Conflict Group
conflict_group.description: Serialization group for mutually exclusive workstreams.

estimated_context_tokens.title: Estimated Context Tokens
estimated_context_tokens.description: Estimated token count for AI context.

max_cost_usd.title: Max Cost USD
max_cost_usd.description: Maximum allowed API cost for this workstream.

test_gates.title: Test Gates
test_gates.description: Test gates that must pass before completion.
